short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The browser extension that detects `` tags that cause Layout Shift

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Detects elements that may cause Layout Shift from the current tab page. 1. Access the page you want to inspect. 2. Open the console tab of the dev-tools. 3. Click on the extension icon that appears in the upper right corner of your browser window. 4. Wait a few seconds as the image inspection begins. 5. The result will be output to console. Details: https://github.com/mizdra/img-layout-shift-detector
